attributes.action: Why are our kids forced to sexual perversion?Shouldn't we protect our children?
attributes.additional_details:
It’s A disgrace!!! my blood is boiling within me and my anger is rising! 
Seems like no one is now able to see what is right or wrong. 
THAT IS 100% WRONG!!! WRONG WRONG and WRONG!
The empire theatre of Liverpool and the company that allow this to be exposed in front of all the people AND CHILDREN should be condemn. Furthermore, I thought walking around naked on the public streets was prohibited in England, then what is the logic in allowing naked people picture to be displayed in public places?
attributes.background:
The display of a picture advertising a play at the Empire Theatre of Liverpool on its own most exposed wall is outrageous.
The picture shows a young man from the back, naked, sweaty, and giving a thumbs up! The picture is huge, thousand of children will see it in a day(buses main route,city centre)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
